title: Review a Movie : BookMyShow Support Centre
body: Solution home FAQ's Ratings & Reviews Review a Movie Print Modified on: Sat, 21 Mar, 2020 at  6:29 PM I would like to post a review on BookMyShow. We would love to know your views about the movie you watched. Click on the movie you would like to review, rate & review it here. Did you find it helpful? Yes No Send feedback Sorry we couldn't be helpful. Help us improve this article with your feedback.
